summary: Ginger Baker looks back on his musical career with Cream and Blind Faith; his introduction to Fela Kuti; his self-destructive patterns and losses of fortune; and his current life inside a fortified South African compound.
cast: Bob Adcock|Tony Allen|Carmine Appice|Ginette Baker|Ginger Baker|Kofi Baker|Leda Baker|Art Blakey|John Bonham|Bonnie Bramlett|Pete Brown|Jack Bruce|Jay Bulger|Malcolm Cecil|Eric Clapton|Stewart Copeland|Fito De la Parra|Sarah Dixon|Elizabeth Finch|Michael Floorwax|Dizzy Gillespie|Chris Goss|Ric Grech|Joni Haastrup|Mickey Hart|Jon Hiseman|Sandra Izsadore|Elvin Jones|Remi Kabaka|Simon Kirke|Fela Kuti|Femi Kuti|Denny Laine|Bill Laswell|Rick Lewis|John Lydon|Kudzai Machokoto|Lisa Machokoto|Nick Mason|Ron Miles|Charles Mingus|Keith Moon|Tony Palmer|Charlie Parker|Stephen W. title: Cuidado con Mr. Baker
